course_recommendations_markdown:
### Recommended Courses for Missing Skills:

#### Security Principles:
1. **Courses:**
   - [Security in Azure](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/learn/modules/intro-to-security-in-azure/) on Microsoft Learn
   - [Cybersecurity for Managers](https://www.coursera.org/learn/cyber-security-for-managers) on Coursera
   - [Introduction to Cyber Security Specialization](https://www.coursera.org/specializations/intro-cyber-security) on Coursera
   - [Cybersecurity Essentials](https://www.udemy.com/course/cybersecurity-essentials/) on Udemy

2. **Learning Websites:**
   - Microsoft Security Blog
   - Medium's Cybersecurity section
   - Cybersecurity Insiders
   - InfoSec Institute

#### Containerization:
1. **Courses:**
   - [Introduction to Containers with Docker](https://www.linkedin.com/learning/introduction-to-containers-with-docker) on LinkedIn Learning
   - [Docker Mastery: The Complete Toolset From a Docker Captain](https://www.udemy.com/course/docker-mastery/) on Udemy
   - [Containerization and Orchestration with Docker and Kubernetes](https://www.coursera.org/learn/containerization-and-orchestration-with-docker-and-kubernetes) on Coursera
   - [Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) - Zero to Hero](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/learn/modules/aks-zero-to-hero/) on Microsoft Learn

2. **Learning Websites:**
   - Docker Documentation
   - Kubernetes.io
   - Docker Blog
   - Azure Container Registry Documentation

#### Infrastructure as Code (IaC):
1. **Courses:**
   - [Infrastructure as Code with Terraform](https://www.udemy.com/course/learn-terraform/) on Udemy
   - [Azure Resource Manager (ARM) Templates](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/learn/modules/intro-to-arm-templates/) on Microsoft Learn
   - [DevOps Foundations: Infrastructure as Code](https://www.linkedin.com/learning/devops-foundations-infrastructure-as-code) on LinkedIn Learning
   - [Introduction to Infrastructure as Code with AWS CloudFormation](https://www.coursera.org/learn/aws-cloudformation) on Coursera

2. **Learning Websites:**
   - Terraform.io
   - Azure DevOps Documentation
   - HashiCorp Learn
   - AWS CloudFormation User Guide

#### Solution Architecture:
1. **Courses:**
   - [Azure Solutions Architect Study Path](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/learn/certifications/azure-solutions-architect/) on Microsoft Learn
   - [Architecting Microsoft Azure Solutions](https://www.udemy.com/course/architecting-microsoft-azure-solutions/) on Udemy
   - [Solution Architecture: Design & Implementation](https://www.coursera.org/learn/solution-architecture) on Coursera
   - [Azure Architecture Center](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/) on Microsoft Docs

2. **Learning Websites:**
   - Azure Architecture Best Practices
   - The Open Group Architecture Framework (TOGAF)
   - Azure Architecture Center Blog
   - Solutions Architect Community on Microsoft Tech Community

#### Networking:
1. **Courses:**
   - [Networking in Azure](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/learn/modules/intro-to-networking-in-azure/) on Microsoft Learn
   - [Computer Networking Basics](https://www.coursera.org/learn/computer-networking) on Coursera
   - [Networking Essentials](https://www.udemy.com/course/networking-essentials/) on Udemy
   - [LinkedIn Learning Path: Become a Network Administrator](https://www.linkedin.com/learning/paths/become-a-network-administrator)

2. **Learning Websites:**
   - Azure Networking Documentation
   - Cisco Networking Academy
   - Network World
   - Azure Networking Blog

These courses and websites should help you in developing the necessary skills for the Azure Solutions Architect role. Good luck with your learning journey! 🚀
